approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used by the token.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from the caller’s account.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a specified address.

burnFrom.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from another address's account.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

approveAndCall.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified and then calls the specified contract.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of an owner.

constructor.description: Constructor function that initializes the contract.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.

Burn.description: Emitted when tokens are burned from the caller’s account.
